channel.title: Auxy 5.3 Update / Ableton Link bug
channel.description:
So i just got on to see a update, I’ve had a lot of the issues they have fixed, so that’s always good, and a few new features we did know we wanted. I’m definitely going to mess with the new samples! So what are your guys opinions on the new update?
Also here is a Poll for what you want to see in the future! https://docs.google.com/forms/d/1wtRRBLHaFoEjQxfSgSF1LyWHMiI3Ej9c2ItMNc4ui-8

It worked perfect that time and definitely explains why

item.title: Auxy 5.3 Update / Ableton Link bug
item.dc:creator: blakkaz
item.description:
No. Same behaviour of BPM jumping and Auxy not playing.

I’ve just had a small win though…

When adding Auxy to an existing session in AUM, the issue is present when first opening, but seems like it can be circumvented by highlighting a different clip.

  1. Open AUM & start a session playing
  2. Open Auxy
  • At this stage Auxy will not play (BPM does stay the same when using AUM)
  1. Highlight a different clip in Auxy
  • It works!

AUM is the only app I’ve managed to have any success with…
Hopefully this points you in the right direction.

Read full topic

@Auxy

Auxy (iPhone) + Auxy (iPad)
Auxy (iPhone) + Other Apps(iPad)

and all permutations thereof.

Read full topic

item.title: Auxy 5.3 Update / Ableton Link bug
item.dc:creator: Auxy
item.description:
Thanks for the additional info! The positive thing is that it went away and then came back, because that means that we are more likely to be able to reproduce the bug on “any setup”, which we’ll try to do and see if we can trace the bug with the debugger connected.

Read full topic

item.title: Auxy 5.3 Update / Ableton Link bug
item.dc:creator: blakkaz
item.description:
iammane:

Starting fresh. Open Blocs, hit play. Go back to home screen while it’s playing, open Auxy, hit play - suddenly it works.

  1. Open Blocs Wave & hit play (BPM @ 120)
  2. Back to home screen with Blocs still playing
  3. Open Auxy
  4. BPM jumped to 300 in Auxy and 999 in Blocs Wave (actual BPM was 999)
  5. Auxy won’t play

Read full topic
